actions.name: Rampage

cost.trigger: The user causes another creature to gain @Affliction[fainted] with a Physical or Special-Category attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user causes another creature to gain @Affliction[fainted] with a Physical or Special-Category attack.

Effect: The user gains half of the PP used in the triggering attack. If the triggering attack was an [Exhaust] attack, the user instead gains back all of the PP spent, and the attack does not consume a Simple Action the user's next Activation.
